thread.title: White House confuses Theresa May's name with PORN STAR in embarrassing gaffe ahead of historic Donald Trump meeting
thread.title_full: White House confuses Theresa May's name with PORN STAR in embarrassing gaffe ahead of historic Donald Trump meeting

author: Ann Gripper
title: White House confuses Theresa May's name with PORN STAR in embarrassing gaffe ahead of historic Donald Trump meeting
text:
News White House confuses Theresa May's name with PORN STAR in embarrassing gaffe ahead of historic Donald Trump meeting It emerged this morning it mistook the spelling of the vicar's daughter Theresa May's name the with actress Teresa May in media guidance notes ahead of audience with Donald Trump Share By Ann Gripper Stephen Jones 08:28, 27 JAN 2017 Theresa May, the British PM, not to be confused with Teresa May the porn star (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
The White House has made a major embarrassing gaffe - by confusing the name of the British Prime Minister with a PORN STAR. 
It emerged this morning it mistook the spelling of vicar's daughter Theresa May 's name the with glamour model/actress Teresa May in media guidance notes. 
The British PM is set to meet Donald Trump this afternoon - the new US president's first meeting with a foreign head of state. 
The White House's daily guidance and press schedule from the office of the press secretary reads: "In the afternoon, the president will partake in a bilateral meeting with United Kingdom Prime Minister, Teresa May" - missing out the "h" in her name, despite spelling it correctly elsewhere. 
It continued: "The president participates in a working luncheon with Teresa May, Prime Minister of United Kingdom." Donald Trump has been looking forward to the meeting (Photo: Getty Images) 
Teresa May - without the "h" - is in fact a soft porn actress and glamour model who also starred in a video for the song Smack My Bitch Up, by dance music band The Prodigy. 
The error was repeated in a later guidance note from the Office of the Vice President, though it elsewhere also spelled her name correctly, before finally being rectified fully in another notice from the same office. 
Teresa May - the actress - also trended on Twitter during the race to be prime minister last summer. 
MirrorOnline reported last July that the porn star's name inadvertently became popular after Andrea Leadsom announced she was quitting the Tory leadership battle - but there was no sign of Theresa May spelled correctly with an "h". The White House notes where Theresa May's name is spelt wrong (Photo: PA) 
Understandably her Twitter biog at the time was: "I am a UK model, not the Home Secretary." 
At the time the actress was advertising worn underwear for sale - and signed topless photos in her tweets. Read More 
Teresa May was in fact born in the mid 1960s, a decade after her political (nearly) namesake. Her real name is Teresa Betteridge. (Photo: Rex) 
She has appeared in magazines like Hustler, Men Only and Razzle. 
She appeared in the Prodigy's infamous single in 1997 and then went into B movies with titles like Nude & Naughty, Petticoat Passions Vol 1 and Lesbian Studen Nurses. Read More Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin to speak on phone tomorrow in first chat since hacking scandal and leaked dossier 
One review of the Teresa May Special on Amazon says: "This DVD is basically a collection of scenes from previous videos. They're OK, nothing special. The 2nd scene is the best, but the last scene (bondage scenario) is amateurish at best." 
Another says: "This DVD is ok if you're a big fan of Teresa May, but there's not a lot to get excited about. Just her, with a couple of female friends stripping and wiggling for the camera. Not very erotica at all." 
Another DVD product description says: "Teresa May has sex with her man in various positions, for the enjoyment of the viewing millions. Although one would hope that she enjoys it, too." Like us on Facebook
